articles.author: Eli Stokols
articles.title: Trump wants one thing from the NATO summit. Europe is going to give it to him. - Politico
articles.description: A streamlined summit centering around a new pledge to increase defense spending has been designed to give the president a victory lap.
articles.content: Trump intends to deliver a speech Wednesday at the summits conclusion heralding the new spending pledge and his own catalytic role. But Trumps victory wont prevent him from pressuring countries to do… [+6999 chars]

articles.author: Mehul Srivastava
articles.title: Israel strikes Iran’s Isfahan nuclear facility as Trump weighs entering war - Financial Times
articles.description: US president dismisses European-led negotiations on a ceasefire as ineffective
articles.content:
